#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long rhetoric(long a)
{ long z=0,d,rubert;
  while(a)
  {
    d=a%10;
    if(d%2==0)
    {
      z=z+2*d;
    }
    else
    {z=z+d;}
    a=a/10;
  }
  rubert=z%10;
  return rubert ;
}
int main()
{ long long t,a,b,hell,i;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>a>>b;
hell=0;
while(a<b&&a%10!=0)
{
   hell=hell+rhetoric(a);
   a++;
}
while(b>a&&b%10!=0)
{
    hell=hell+rhetoric(b);
    b--;
}
hell=hell+(45*(b-a))/10;
hell=hell+rhetoric(b);
cout<<hell<<"\n";
}

return 0;
}
